722777f.title: Manhattan: Riverside Drive - 120th Street (West)
722777f.text:
486-492 Riverside Drive, east side, between West 120th and 122nd
Streets, showing a 12-story apartment under demolition. Upon this site
was constructed a 21-story structure (No. 485) that adjoins the Riverside
Baptist Church. The latter, built at that date, would stand on the left,
occupying the S.E. corner of West 122nd Street. Partially seen on the
left is the tower atop the Chapel of the Union Theological Seminary. This
set consists of a negative and a positive.
November 15, 1926.
Gift of Albert A. Volk Co.
